akas from release info: Strange Days with Bob Saget (original title)
Bob Saget on America USA (working title)
Bob Saget's Strange Days USA (complete title)

1.title: Riding Shotgun with Hardcore Bikers

episode of.title: Strange Days with Bob Saget (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Bob gets a firsthand look at the world of motorcycle clubs as he rides shotgun in a sidecar from Kentucky to Florida with the Iron Order Motorcycle Club, one of the fastest growing motorcycle clubs in the country.

2.title: Let's Go Squatching: The Search for Bigfoot

episode of.title: Strange Days with Bob Saget (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Bob travels to the Pacific Northwest to search for Bigfoot with the BFRO, the Bigfoot Field Research Organization. Along the trip he meets some interesting characters who all have their own Bigfoot experiences.

3.title: How to Pledge and Be Hazed by an Ivy League Fraternity

episode of.title: Strange Days with Bob Saget (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Bob heads to the campus of Ivy League school, Cornell University, to pledge a fraternity called "The Seal and Serpent Society." Bob goes through the paces to try and fulfill his duties as an honorary pledge.

4.title: What's So Funny About Pro Wrestling?

episode of.title: Strange Days with Bob Saget (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Bob goes from the backyards to the barrio to the big time as he explores the world of wrestling. Bob will ride along with two Lucha Libre brothers who wrestle in a church in East Los Angeles using their secret identities. He'll go to a backyard wrestling match where wannabe tough guys jump through tables to put on a show for their friends and neighbors.

5.title: Homesick at Summer Camp

episode of.title: Strange Days with Bob Saget (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Bob spends a week with a hundred parent-less kids at the Copper Creek Summer Camp in the central California mountains. He serves as a counselor to a cabin of boys and tries to survive the non-stop schedule of grueling daily activities.

6.title: Lost Vegas, Lost Weekend

episode of.title: Strange Days with Bob Saget (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Bob spends a long weekend in Sin City to take a look at this iconic town through the eyes of three distinct groups. A high-roller takes Bob on the ride of a lifetime in his off-road vehicle in the Mint 400 desert race.

imdb.plot outline: A new real-life series that busts down barriers to investigate some of America's most fascinating subcultures and corners of society. Documenting his journey around America, Bob Saget immerses himself in different unusual cultures from the world of Bigfoot hunters to the trials of the pro-wrestling circuit.
